title: China’s Biggest EV Maker Built a Boxer Engine For Its 1,287-HP Luxury Sedan
description: Only two automakers have stuck to the flat or boxer layout over the years. That would be Porsche and Subaru, and we don't see anyone else joining them soon. But here comes Chinese automaker BYD, seemingly out of nowhere, making one. It's a bit of a surprise, given that BYD already has its own ...
titleSummary: "Beijing's Electric Giant Cranks Out Insane Horsepower with High-Tech Muscle Car V8"
descriptionSummary: In an unexpected turn, Chinese automaker BYD is bucking convention by introducing a flat-four engine layout, a niche design previously dominated by Porsche and Subaru. This move comes as a surprise to industry observers.

title: How This Ford Truck With 28,000 Christmas Lights Saves Lives
description: It’s that time of year again, when everyone tapes a sea of LEDs to their cars in the name of holiday spirit. While most builds aim to impress or grab as much attention as possible, a small handful have a deeper meaning behind them. Reed Taylor’s Ford Super Duty falls into that latter, turning heads ...
titleSummary: "Decked-Out Rescue Vehicle Brings Holiday Cheer and Hope to Disaster Zones"
descriptionSummary: As the holiday season descends, vehicles transform with twinkling lights and creative flair. But one Ford Super Duty stands out for its thoughtful design, rather than mere spectacle, sparking admiration from passersby as it cruises through the winter wonderland.

title: 1977 Porsche 911 Built for the Track With 3.8L Flat-Six Makes Modern Porsches Look Tame
description: A heavily modified 1977 Porsche 911 Coupe has hit Cars & Bids with a current bid of $77,777, offering one of the most extensively race-prepared air-cooled builds currently on the site. Finished in blue and black with a stripped, competition-focused cabin, the car carries a clean ...
titleSummary: "Porsche's Unbridled Beast: A Fierce '77 911 Proves Today's Cars Are Just Civilized"
descriptionSummary: This 1977 Porsche 911 Coupe has been meticulously transformed into a high-performance racing machine, boasting an impressive array of modifications that make it a standout among air-cooled 911s currently listed on Cars & Bids.

title: Dartz Is Returning With Another Wild Creation—And It's Coming to America
description: It's not every day you get a personal message from a company CEO, but if it's from a company called Dartz Motorz (yes, with Zs), we couldn't help but pay attention. Leonard Yankelovich has turned this once-obscure Latvian marque into a name recognized far beyond the automotive world, partly because ...
titleSummary: "Dartz Unleashes Next-Big-Thing Roadster in Shocking Stateside Debut"
descriptionSummary: Dartz Motorz' CEO has sent out a personal message that's piqued our interest. Under Leonard Yankelovich's leadership, this once-unknown Latvian brand has made waves globally, thanks to its bold approach and innovative spirit.

title: Hyundai Says It Has Overtaken Volkswagen as the World’s No. 2 Most Profitable Automaker
description: Hyundai Motor Group says it has now passed Volkswagen Group to become the second-most profitable automaker in the world, a milestone confirmed by CEO José Muñoz during a recent media briefing in France. Muñoz claimed Hyundai has been the world’s No. 3 automaker by volume for several years, but ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen's Crown Slips as Hyundai Takes Silver in Global Auto Sales
descriptionSummary: Hyundai Motor Group has surged past Volkswagen to become the second-most profitable automobile manufacturer globally, according to CEO José Muñoz, who made the announcement during a media gathering in France recently.

title: GM Boosts 10-Speed Transmission Output With $300 Million Investment
description: General Motors is putting another $300 million into its Romulus Propulsion Systems plant in Michigan, part of a wider $550 million manufacturing package aimed at preparing GM for a major North American production ramp-up in 2027. The move expands output of GM’s ...
titleSummary: "GM Doubles Down on 10-Speed Transmissions with Hefty Investment Push"
descriptionSummary: General Motors is injecting an additional $300 million into its Romulus facility to enhance production capacity ahead of a significant North American expansion scheduled for 2027, as part of a broader $550 million investment plan.

title: Hyundai Crater Concept Signals Serious Off-Road Ambitions
description: The Hyundai Crater Concept was easily the most intriguing model to emerge from this year’s Los Angeles Auto Show – and, despite its name, you shouldn’t confuse it with the typical fantasy in chrome show car. “This is not just a concept car,” acknowledged SangYup Lee, executive vice president and ...
titleSummary: Hyundai Hints at Aggressive New 4x4 Strategy with Daring Concept Debut
descriptionSummary: At this year's Los Angeles Auto Show, Hyundai unveiled the Crater Concept, a design that defied expectations of traditional concept cars. It's a grounded approach to automotive innovation, rather than a flashy fantasy in chrome.

title: Mercedes Tells Dealers How It Plans to Beat BMW in America
description: Luxury car brands in the US operate in a constant shuffle for the top position, and BMW is the one holding the lead as of the first half of 2025. Mercedes sits close behind, but the gap is enough to remind Stuttgart that gaining ground will take more than a few well-timed model launches. The ...
titleSummary: Mercedes Unveils Ambitious Roadmap to Dethrone BMW as US Sales Leader
descriptionSummary: In the highly competitive US luxury car market, BMW holds a narrow yet significant advantage over its closest rival, Mercedes-Benz, as of mid-2025. Mercedes remains in striking distance, but closing the gap won't be easy without sustained effort and strategic moves.

title: Meet the $300K Italian Jeep With a 700-HP Hellcat V8
description: Stradale Modena is a high-end boutique tuning company based in the Emilia-Romagna region — Italy’s ‘Motor Valley’. Home to Ferrari, Lamborghini, Pagani, Maserati, and Ducati, this region has a history steeped in mechanical excellence and opulence. While their neighbours hand-build some of the most ...
titleSummary: "Meet the $300K Italian Stallion: A 700-HP Monster on Wheels"
descriptionSummary: In the heart of Italy's automotive epicenter, Emilia-Romagna, Stradale Modena crafts bespoke masterpieces that redefine luxury and performance. Nestled among storied marques like Ferrari and Lamborghini, this boutique tuner embodies the region's rich tradition of mechanical artistry and refinement.

title: Hawaiʻi Police Crack Down on Truck Mods & Illegal Window Tinting
description: Hawaiʻi Island police have issued a stern reminder to vehicle owners following numerous complaints about modified trucks and illegal window tinting across the region. The announcement comes as authorities observe an increasing number of vehicles with modifications that violate county and state ...
titleSummary: "Hawaiʻi Cops Ramp Up Enforcement on Modified Trucks and Dazzlingly Dark Windows"
descriptionSummary: Hawai'i Island police are cracking down on illegally modified vehicles, citing excessive window tints and other infractions that have drawn numerous resident complaints throughout the island's communities.

title: Ford’s Plug-In SUVs Face New Fire Risk — And There’s Still No Fix
description: Owners of the Ford Escape plug-in hybrid and Lincoln Corsair PHEV (both of which will soon be retired) from the 2022-2024 model years have bad news. Their vehicles are facing a recall from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration due to an issue with the high-voltage battery that could ...
titleSummary: Ford's Electric SUVs Plagued by Unresolved Fire Hazard Concerns
descriptionSummary: Ford is issuing a recall for certain 2022-2024 Escape plug-in hybrids and Lincoln Corsair PHEVs, after a defect was discovered in the high-voltage batteries of these models.

title: Genesis Magma GT Concept Revealed: A Wild Mid-Engine V8 Supercar That Could Rival The Porsche 911
description: A few days ago, on the southern coast of France, Genesis pulled the wraps off its most daring concept car yet: the Magma GT. With mid-engine proportions, undeniably V8-esque engine sounds, and styling that mimics Genesis Magma Racing’s IMSA-ready hypercar, this hot piece of rock shocked the crowds ...
titleSummary: "Mid-Engine Fury Unleashed: Genesis Introduces Electrifying V8-Powered Supercar Challenger to the 911"
descriptionSummary: In a bold move on France's sun-kissed southern coast, Genesis unveiled its most audacious concept car to date: the Magma GT. This striking vehicle boasts a powerful mid-engine design and an unapologetic V8 roar.

title: Porsche Admits the Hyundai Ioniq 5 N Is Influencing Its Next EV Sports Cars
description: The Hyundai Ioniq 5 N is just a brilliant EV, silently turning into the performance nameplate that even legacy sports-car brands can't ignore. And we're not talking about smaller brands punching up. Lamborghini has taken it for a spin. BMW M has dissected its tricks. Now, Porsche is openly joining ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Acknowledges Hyundai's Electric Coup de Grâce Has Rattled Its High-Performance Plans"
descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Ioniq 5 N is turning heads with its exceptional performance capabilities, earning the attention of even the most esteemed sports-car brands, including iconic names like Lamborghini and Porsche, who are taking notice of this electric upstart.

title: Why Your Hyundai or Kia EV Charges So Slowly on Tesla’s Supercharger Network
description: Over the last year or two, EV manufacturers have gradually added support for their vehicles to be recharged using a Tesla Supercharger, starting with an announcement by Ford in 2023. Both Kia and Hyundai started adding Supercharger capability for its EVs earlier this year, opening up access to ...
titleSummary: Hyundai, Kia Owners Left Stalled on Tesla's High-Speed Charging Grid
descriptionSummary: In recent years, several electric vehicle manufacturers have begun enabling their cars to charge at Tesla's extensive network of Superchargers, a move that expands charging options for drivers across the country.

title: China Unveils $30K Land Rover Defender Lookalike With a 745-Mile Range
description: The Chinese car industry is relatively young, but it's already making waves around the world. There are some that can be called world-class, while others still need improvement — and that's putting it very lightly. That brings us neatly to iCar or iCaur for overseas markets. It's a brand under ...
titleSummary: "China's Electric Challenger to Luxury SUVs Debuts with Impressive Long-Range Credentials"
descriptionSummary: China's automotive scene may have arrived on the global stage relatively recently, but its presence is already being felt worldwide. Some Chinese cars are impressing critics with their quality, while others leave much to be desired. One such marque vying for international attention is iCar, an emerging brand aiming to make a mark overseas.

title: Here's How Tariffs Are Expected To Impact Mazda (and You) In 2026
description: Tariffs on cars, trucks, and SUVs have proven troublesome for automakers. Consumers haven’t (yet) felt the full effect - auto prices are relatively staid compared to tariffs - but auto companies sure have. Mazda is the latest to announce earnings, and says tariffs have “a significant impact” on its ...
titleSummary: Mazda Buyers Face Tariff Hike in 2026, and What It Means for Consumers
descriptionSummary: Automotive industry executives are bracing for the effects of tariffs, which have already started to take a toll on manufacturers like Mazda. Consumer prices remain steady, but carmakers are feeling the pinch.

title: Are You Willing to Pay $63,000 For a Honda Prelude? Some Dealers Think So
description: Dealer markups aren’t new. Over the last few years, everything from EVs to practical family crossovers has gone through a cycle of inflated “market adjustment” pricing. Some of the numbers seen during the height of supply shortages still look surreal today, and now the Prelude finds itself added to ...
titleSummary: "Dealers Bet Buyers Will Shell Out Six-Figures for Rare Honda Model"
descriptionSummary: Dealer markups have long been a fact of life in the automotive world, with prices often inflated beyond sticker price during times of high demand or low supply. Now, the Prelude has become the latest casualty of this trend.

title: China’s Sexy Honda Integra Targa Concept Steals The Prelude’s Spotlight
description: The current Acura Integra is a genuinely fun car for the enthusiast on a slightly tighter budget, but not everyone was happy that the revived Integra assumed a five-door liftback body style—the best Integras (and later, the RSX) were lauded for their sporty two-door style. Well, a new Integra with ...
titleSummary: "China's Showstopper: Honda Integra Targa Concept Takes Center Stage in Beijing"
descriptionSummary: A loyal following of Acura enthusiasts has been eagerly awaiting a revival of the classic sports coupe body style that defined earlier Integras and RSX models, and now it seems their wishes are about to be fulfilled.

title: Vorsteiner’s New Ferrari 458 CTR Build Is the Cleanest 458 Restyle in Years
description: Aftermarket modification is a fun and creative way to express personal taste, but when it comes to tuning a Ferrari, the results are often short of classy. Not so with the new CTR Program for the spectacular 458 Italia. Vorsteiner's Classic Tuning Restoration Program, announced at the 2025 SEMA ...
titleSummary: Vorsteiner's Sleek Makeover Transforms Ferrari 458 into a Work of Artisanal Perfection
descriptionSummary: Taking customization to the next level, the CTR Program brings sophisticated style to the Ferrari 458 Italia. Unveiled at the 2025 SEMA show, this premium tuning program elevates the iconic supercar with understated flair and refined precision.

title: Lucid Just Beat Tesla and Porsche to Become the Best Luxury EV Brand for 2025
description: Lucid Motors, a company that has only been building cars for four years and currently sells just two models, has been named the best luxury electric vehicle brand for 2025 by U.S. News & World Report. The publication ranked Lucid above Rivian, BMW, Porsche, and even Tesla, praising the American ...
titleSummary: Lucid Electric Takes Top Spot in 2025 Luxury Vehicle Rankings Amid Industry Rivals
descriptionSummary: Lucid Motors, a rapidly rising player in the electric vehicle market with just four years of experience, has been hailed as the top luxury EV brand for 2025 by U.S. News & World Report.

title: 2027 Range Rover Evoque Turning To Electric Power To Revive Sales
description: Based on 2008's LRX concept, the Range Rover Evoque first arrived in 2011. As the smallest and softest Range Rover to date, it faced early criticism, but it was successful enough to warrant a second generation in 2018, which is still in production today. As attractive and popular as it's been, ...
titleSummary: "Range Rover Evoque Gets Shock of Electric Life in 2027 Model Year"
descriptionSummary: The Range Rover Evoque made its debut in 2011, emerging from the LRX concept unveiled eight years prior. Initially met with skepticism due to its size and luxury credentials, it won over audiences and earned a sequel in 2018.

title: The Bestselling Tesla Model Y Just Scored the Worst Reliability Rating in a Decade
description: The 2025 TÜV Report has delivered an unwelcome verdict for Tesla, with the Model Y topping the unreliability list among two to three-year-old cars with a 17.3% serious defect rate. TÜV represents Germany's rigorous vehicle inspection authority. It ensures all vehicles meet strict safety and ...
titleSummary: Tesla's Star Model Takes a Tumble: Worst Reliability in Years Hits Top Seller
descriptionSummary: A recent report from Germany's respected vehicle inspection authority has shed an unflattering light on Tesla, with the Model Y earning the dubious distinction of highest unreliability among two to three-year-old cars, boasting a serious defect rate of 17.3%.

title: Rivian Is Following Tesla, Spins Up New AI And Robotics Startup
description: Tesla is nearly done with having vehicles as its number one priority, and Rivian may not be far behind. In its third-quarter shareholders' letter, Rivian says it’s building advanced artificial intelligence (AI) and robots. The extent of its initiative is unknown, but at least for now, it will be ...
titleSummary: Rivian Dives into Artificial Intelligence with Launch of New Tech Venture
descriptionSummary: Rivian is shifting gears from electric vehicles to focus on AI and robotics development, as hinted in its latest shareholder update. The company's ambitious new initiative promises to unlock innovative applications and possibilities yet to be explored.

title: Study Finds Gen Zs As the "Riskiest" Drivers on the Road
description: As the global population grows, more people are getting behind the wheel for the first time, and that naturally leads to more cars sharing the same roads. It’s a usual part of modern life: more commuting, more school runs, more weekend trips. With that comes an obvious reality – when the ...
titleSummary: Gen Z Earns Distinction as the Most Hazardous Generation Behind the Wheel
descriptionSummary: As global populations expand, new drivers hit the road, increasing congestion on already crowded thoroughfares. The result is a familiar challenge: more daily commutes, school drop-offs, and weekend excursions, leading to inevitable traffic snarls.

title: Brabus Turns Mercedes-AMG G63 Into Wild Convertible With 788 HP
description: If you want a new Mercedes-Benz convertible, your options include the CLE Cabriolet, AMG SL Roadster, and Maybach SL Roadster. All are classy and luxurious, with some leaning more into luxury and others being mighty sports cars. What none of them are is an off-roader, and that’s where a new pair of ...
titleSummary: "Brabus Unleashes 788-Horsepower AMG G63 Roadster: A Rebel's Dream Comes to Life"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz fans craving a convertible have three sleek options: the CLE Cabriolet, AMG SL Roadster, and Maybach SL Roadster. While luxurious, each has its own unique personality - some refined, others high-octane.

title: One of the Rarest TVRs Ever Made Was Once Driven by Jeremy Clarkson—and It’s Now for Sale
description: Automotive brands come and go – some are completely forgotten, while others retain some sort of recognition through the remaining models still seen on the road. TVR is one such brand. A formerly formidable British sports car maker, it's had its fair share of ups and downs, eventually leading to ...
titleSummary: "Jeremy Clarkson's Holy Grail TVR Hits the Market in a Rare Auction Opportunity"
descriptionSummary: The storied history of TVR, a once-prominent British sports car manufacturer, is marked by periods of great success and significant decline, leaving behind a legacy that continues to captivate enthusiasts today.

title: This New Chinese EV Has the Same Suspension Tech Used in Ferraris and Corvettes
description: The new Deepal L06 has been revealed in China with a headline feature few mass-market EVs can claim: magnetorheological dampers, the same core technology found in Ferraris, Corvettes and high-end GM products. Deepal, a sub-brand of Changan, is pitching the L06 as the first ...
titleSummary: "Chinese Electric Vehicle Leverages High-Performance Suspension Technology from Global Supercar Brands"
descriptionSummary: Changan's Deepal sub-brand has unveiled its latest model, the L06, boasting an impressive feature typically reserved for luxury sports cars: magnetorheological dampers that deliver exceptional handling and stability.

title: BMW’s New iX3 Just Smashed Its Range Rating With a 1,000-km Run on One Charge
description: The BMW iX3 is exceeding expectations in more ways than one. Not only is demand for the futuristic-looking electric crossover so great that BMW can't build it fast enough, but the iX3 has also managed to impress in the one department where EVs are typically disappointing: range. In a video on the ...
titleSummary: "BMW's Electrifying iX3 Sets Long-Range Record with Jaw-Dropping 1,000km Battery Test Drive"
descriptionSummary: The BMW iX3 is outpacing forecasts in multiple areas, with high demand far exceeding production capacity. Moreover, its impressive electric range is setting a new standard for plug-in vehicles.

title: This Fully Loaded Porsche Cayenne Turbo Electric Costs Over $253,000
description: Porsche recently unveiled the Cayenne Electric, and the Turbo version is the most powerful production model from the company yet. Producing an outrageous 1,139 horsepower with launch control, this heavy SUV will reach 60 mph in only 2.4 seconds—exactly the same time as the lithe 911 Turbo S. Such ...
titleSummary: "Priced to Excess: Porsche's Most Opulent Cayenne Yet Tops a Quarter Million Dollars"
descriptionSummary: Porsche's new Cayenne Electric Turbo shatters records, delivering a staggering 1,139 horsepower and launch control for lightning-fast acceleration to 60mph in just 2.4 seconds, rivaling the 911 Turbo S's impressive pace.

title: This Dodge Magnum Revival Shows How America Could Bring Back the Muscle Wagon
description: Blame it on SUVs and crossovers, but most automakers are reluctant to produce wagons these days. At least there are the Europeans who still make them, but it's really more for the continent. The wagon situation in America is bleak, and we haven't even had a large wagon in decades. Genesis surprised ...
titleSummary: "America's Muscle Car Revival Hints at a New Era for Performance Wagons"
descriptionSummary: The wagon market has taken a backseat in recent years, largely due to the rise of SUVs and crossovers. However, European automakers continue to produce stylish wagons, mainly catering to their domestic audience. But in America, the landscape is barren, with no large wagons available for decades – until now.

title: A New Chinese Off-Roader Looks Ready to Take On the Jeep Wrangler
description: Beijing Off-Road has just revealed something genuinely unexpected: a hulking prototype that looks suspiciously similar to the Rezvani Tank. Officially called the ELMT Max, the concept was unveiled at the 2025 Guangzhou Auto Show in China. While Chinese cars aren’t allowed to be sold in the United ...
titleSummary: "China's Challenger to the King of Rugged Roads Unveiled"
descriptionSummary: Beijing Off-Road has unveiled a striking concept vehicle that bears an uncanny resemblance to the Rezvani Tank. Dubbed the ELMT Max, this imposing prototype made its debut at the 2025 Guangzhou Auto Show in China, sparking curiosity among automotive enthusiasts worldwide.

title: DMV Made at Least $280 Million From its Data-Selling Side Hustle
description: Over the year, concerns over data privacy have been rising. We've now reached a point wherein our cars would track our habits, note them, and essentially serve as data points for whoever wants or needs them — usually insurance companies. Vehicle connectivity has been a double-edged sword. While ...
titleSummary: "State Bureau Rakes in Hundreds of Millions from Selling Driver Info to Private Firms"
descriptionSummary: As vehicles become increasingly connected, concerns about data privacy are escalating. Our cars now collect and store intimate details of our daily habits, making us vulnerable to exploitation by third-party companies seeking valuable insights – often for profit-driven purposes.

title: Collectors Are Driving This Ultra-Rare 12,000-Mile 1995 Honda NSX-R Near $400,000
description: Values of first-generation Acura NSXs (badged as the Honda NSX elsewhere) have surged in recent years, especially for pristine, rare, or manual examples. The sports car’s timeless style and engaging driving experience have endeared it to JDM fans everywhere, and the desire for clean first-gen NSXs ...
titleSummary: Rare 1995 NSX-R Sells for Fortune Amid Fervent Collector Interest
descriptionSummary: A new era of appreciation has emerged for early Acura NSX models, with values skyrocketing for low-mileage, rare, or manual variants. The car's iconic design and thrilling performance have won over enthusiasts worldwide, particularly those in the JDM community.

title: GM Faces Another $5 Million Lawsuit For Defective V8 Engines
description: General Motors has been dragged to court several times this year, and it's headed there again after another displeased customer filed a lawsuit against the conglomerate over dissatisfaction with the faulty L87 V8 engine. Earlier lawsuits have included one for a braking defect and another for an ...
titleSummary: "GM Slammed with New Lawsuit Over Flawed V8 Engine Designs"
descriptionSummary: General Motors is facing yet another lawsuit, this time from a disgruntled customer who claims to be unhappy with the performance of the company's L87 V8 engine, which they say has been plagued by defects.

title: James May’s Porsche 911 Carrera S For Sale With 31,000 Miles Is Packed With British Charm
description: Once in a blue moon, a car listing appears where the story behind it is almost more compelling than the car itself. This is one of those. A 2010 Porsche 911 Carrera S has just appeared on Collecting Cars, and while the car is desirable in its own right, the owner adds a quiet sort of charm that ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Perfection with a Touch of English Elegance Hits the Market"
descriptionSummary: Rarely does a car listing capture our attention with a tale as captivating as the vehicle itself. This 2010 Porsche 911 Carrera S on Collecting Cars boasts both desirability and an endearing backstory.

title: GM Ends Corvette No-Flip Rules for Most Models
description: GM has dramatically changed its approach to preventing vehicle flipping by removing ownership retention periods for most Corvette variants. The automaker removed the six month retention period for 2025 and 2026 Corvette E-Ray and Z06 models, though vehicles delivered by November 5, 2026 remain ...
titleSummary: Corvette Owners Now Free to Flip Their Birds.
descriptionSummary: General Motors is taking a more flexible approach to preventing car flipping with its Corvette lineup. For the E-Ray and Z06 variants, GM has dropped ownership retention periods entirely, except for cars delivered by a specific cutoff date.

title: Porsche Is Keeping Combustion Alive With a New Water-Injection System
description: While Oldsmobile, Saab, and even BMW have dabbled in water-injection systems for production cars over the years, Porsche has been quietly filing patents that indicate a strong interest in refining this technology at Stuttgart. For the uninitiated, water injection is a method of cooling the intake ...
titleSummary: Porsche Fights Gas-Guzzler Label with Innovative Fuel-Saving Tech Breakthrough
descriptionSummary: Porsche's engineers are exploring innovative ways to improve engine performance with water injection, a technique previously employed by select manufacturers like Oldsmobile and Saab, but now being refined by Porsche in their German workshops.

title: The Porsche 911 GT3 Gets a Wild New Manthey Kit and It’s Faster Than Ever
description: When it comes to performance, most brands like Porsche have their own internal capabilities; they are, after all, a sports car company. However, there are exceptions. Manthey Racing was born in the confines of the racetrack, becoming a legendary team that started tinkering with Porsches back in ...
titleSummary: "Manthey's Magic Touch Boosts Porsche 911 GT3 to Unprecedented Speed Heights"
descriptionSummary: Few companies can rival Porsche's in-house performance prowess, but one notable exception is Manthey Racing, a storied team forged on the track and renowned for its innovative work with Porsches dating back to the early days of motorsport.

title: Waymo Robotaxis Are Coming to Five More Cities—And Your Second Car Might Be in Trouble
description: Waymo robotaxis just circled five more spots on the map, and they might be your streets. The company says its fully autonomous cars are now running in Miami and will switch on in Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando over the next few weeks, with paying riders coming in 2026. That comes ...
titleSummary: "Autonomous Rides Roll Out in 5 New Cities, Leaving Spare Cars in the Dust"
descriptionSummary: Waymo's self-driving taxis are expanding to new cities, including Miami, where they're already operating, and four other major Texas and Florida hubs: Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando, set to debut later this year and start carrying fare-paying passengers in 2026.

title: Porsche Just Turned an Old Cayenne Into a One-Off Desert Runner
description: Porsche's Sonderwunsch program is usually associated with rare machinery and deep pockets, a place where the brand can create one-off builds for buyers who want something more personal than what the standard options sheet can offer. That extends to the Factory Re-Commission side of the program, ...
titleSummary: Porsche Unleashes Sand-Slaying Beast: A Customized Off-Road Cayenne Reborn
descriptionSummary: Porsche's bespoke Sonderwunsch service typically caters to discerning clients seeking unique creations that go beyond standard models, allowing them to commission one-off builds with customized features tailored to their individual tastes and preferences.
